Class MediaItems

java.lang.Object
Model.MediaItems
Direct Known Subclasses:
Photo, Video
public abstract class MediaItems extends Object
MediaItems class - Abstract base class for all media items (photos, videos, etc). Defines common properties and behavior for all media types in the application.
